resources.string: ❗ The WIFI state permission is needed to detect the RC car on your network, so the app can autoconnect to it.\n
❗ The BLUETOOTH permission is needed, so the app can handle the bluetooth of your phone (turn it on/off).\n
❗ The LOCATION permission is needed for both the WIFI, and the BLUETOOTH functionality of the app, hence it is needed in order to continue.\n
❗ The NETWORK state permission is needed to detect the RC car on your network, so the app can autoconnect to it.\n
❗ The BLUETOOTH ADMIN permission is needed in order to scan the area for nearby devices, like the RC car, so the app can autoconnect to it.\n
❗ The INTERNET permission is needed to detect the RC car on your network, so the app can autoconnect to it.\n
❗ The BACKGROUND LOCATION permission is needed, in order for the app to use bluetooth features, so the app can handle the bluetooth of your phone (turn it on/off).\n

❗ Please turn on your wifi before you continue in order to autodetect devices on your network. If you have a RC car connected to the same network that your phone, the app will connect to it automatically.\n
❗ Please enable the app to turn on your bluetooth in order to autodetect devices near you. If you have a RC car near you, the app will connect to it automatically.\n
